document_data.name: Red Dragon Trading Post
document_data.mainbody: The '''Red Dragon Trading Post''', also known as the '''Red Dragon Trading Lodge''', was [[Luskan]]'s most successful overland trading company.
document_data.Location: The post was located in the [[North Bank of Luskan]] near the [[Throat]] water tower in the [[Mirabar District]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Although not as aggressive as Luskan's pirates, Red Dragon employees were always alert and well-armed. Due to staff shortages, they were usually looking to hire, at a rate of four gold pieces per day, with food, water and one ''[[potion of healing]]'' supplied per trip.
document_data.Prices: * 4 [[gp]] per day for caravan guarding (plus one healing potion)
